answers.answer: I'm actually 33weeks and babys head was measuring 2weeks ahead weighing at 5lbs 2oz and they told me it was fine
Gosh I hope so. This is my third and is brand new to me lol. The other two weighed what they were suppose to the whole time.

I'm 31 weeks and my baby is measuring ahead also by 3 weeks and has been measuring ahead throughout but the doctors and midwifes don't seem to be concerned about it so I'm not now either! As long as baby is healthy :)

question: okay so. My doctor sent me to a Specialist to check on baby. Well he never told me that I was going to a specialist. He told me that he was going to diagnose me with Gestational Diabetes but I didn't have Diabetes (he was doing that cause my test came back border line) so I thought the appointment he set up was going to be all about my sugars. Well it wasn't that at all . It was an ultrasound of them checking baby's weight. Which they did and he is 5 pounds 4 oz and was measuring 2 weeks and a couple days ahead. (I'm 32weeks) well the Specialist said I do not have GD and that he wanted to see me back July 1St to check baby's weight because he is concerned in baby's weight. Well I guess my question is. Has anyone went through this? And did yall end up delivering early?
title: Will I deliver early?
